ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It is a class on how to conduct proper research. I would recommend this course to anyone who is interested in conducting social science research.
I would definitely recommend this course for anyone in the social sciences.

I recommend this course because it gives a great opportunity to learn research methods for social science and their logic. It is rare but essential to start own research. The course realized me the reason why I conduct research in a certain procedure. Thus, I recommend this course especially for graduate students who have researched only by own heuristics.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I definitely think the course was good for writing a research design and proposal for future dissertation work. I gained a lot from some of the readings assigned.
It deepened my knowledge of research design -- and for that reason, it will be incredibly useful to my research!
Excellent introduction (for me) to methods, causality, validity, correlation, etcetera. I plan to, and should, review these readings and notes regularly.

The knwoledge from this course helps to build my research design approriately; that must imporve my research quality. I also understood careful points to read papers and make good critiques. Thanks to this course, I could learn a lot from other papers. I think this knowledge also help to improve the quality of my dessertation.
